law.catch_line: Distribution of authorized delegate vote among party candidates.

text.section: Each political party shall, on the first ballot at its national convention, cast this Commonwealth's vote for the candidates as determined by the primary or party caucus and calculated under this section or under party rules, whichever is applicable. Provided, however, that in the event of the death or withdrawal of a candidate receiving votes under this section prior to the tabulation of the first ballot, any delegate votes allocated to such candidate shall be considered uncommitted. Withdrawal shall mean notice in writing by the candidate to the chairman of the Kentucky delegation prior to the first ballot.

law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 431, sec. 8, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 29, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1986.
